comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Count me in, see ya' then.

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: In honor of your muddy trip up Poorman Loop today I had some _Mud Slide_ ice cream for dessert with dinner tonight. [In all seriousness possible on this blog...] I miss riding already and hope to be back on the roads in a couple of weeks. In the meantime enjoy these 72 degree days before they turn into 102 degree days.

comments.author: Katie
comments.body: The University bike shop guys were excited about my muddy rental bike; apparently they have a thing that is like a CAR WASH for your BIKE... and they certainly were going to get to use it!
